price: E quem se alia a Allah e a Seu Mensageiro e aos crentes triunfará, por certo, o partido de Allah é o vencedor.
arabic: وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فَإِنَّ حِزۡبَ ٱللَّهِ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waman yatawalla al-laha warasūlahu wa-alladhīna āmanū fa-inna ḥiz'ba al-lahi humu al-ghālibūna
